    P

    Pawn - Class in pieces
    Represents a Pawn piece in the game.
    Pawn(Game.Color) - Constructor for class pieces.Pawn
    Constructs a new Pawn with the specified color.
    Piece - Class in pieces
    Represents a chess piece and provides methods for move validation, movement, capturing, and move notation.
    Piece(Game.Color) - Constructor for class pieces.Piece
    Constructs a Piece with the specified color.
    pieces - package pieces
     
    Player - Class in elements
    Represents a player in the game, which includes their color option and the color they are assigned to play.
    Player(Player.ColorOption) - Constructor for class elements.Player
    Constructs a new Player based on the provided color option.
    Player.ColorOption - Enum Class in elements
    Enum representing the possible color options for a player.
    playerColor - Variable in class elements.Player
    The color of the player (either WHITE or BLACK).
    Position - Class in elements
    Represents the chessboard's position at any given time in the game.
    Position() - Constructor for class elements.Position
    Constructs a new Position with an empty board and sets up the starting position of the game.
    positionNumber - Variable in class elements.Position
    The position number used to uniquely identify the position in the game's history.
    possibleMoveFromCheck(Game.Color) - Method in class elements.Game
    Determines if a move is possible to escape a check situation.
    promote(Square, Square, Game) - Method in class pieces.Pawn
    Promotes the Pawn to another piece (Queen, Rook, Knight, or Bishop) when it reaches the opponent's back rank.
